response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer holds immense value, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, and based on our assessment, we are prepared to extend a special offer. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to providing exceptional value while ensuring a fair return for us. We are confident this deal will meet both our needs and exceed your expectations.", "product_price": 950000}
